name: Somnium (Tolga Yurtsev)
description:
Explore surreal dimensions, each with different atmospheres and environments. Meet interesting characters. Solve puzzles and mysteries.

Become a dragon's best friend and give it any name you want. Set your enemies on fire and fight huge bosses.

Steal the hearts of girls from different dimensions and romance with them. But it won't be as easy as you think!

Need more words?

Play fun, different types of mini-games scattered throughout the chapters.

Face challenging platforming elements in levels full of traps and dangers. Complete 44 different in-game achievements, each carefully designed.

Collect story pieces throughout your adventure that will take you to different dimensions. Reach the Dark Tower to find the answers you seek.

Content Warning:

This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Blood & Gore, General Mature Content, Partial Nudity or Sexual Content.
